text: The quieter you become, the more you are able to hear. — Rumi
Be where you are; otherwise you will miss your life. — Buddha
What you seek is seeking you. — Rumi
Peace comes from within. Do not seek it without. — Buddha
Let your faith be bigger than your fear.
With every breath, return to your center.
When you let go, you are truly free.
Be kind to yourself — you are a child of the universe.
Silence is not empty; it is full of answers.
Gratitude turns what we have into enough.
Where attention goes, energy flows.
Surrender to what is. Say ‘yes’ to life.
The soul always knows what to do to heal itself. — Unknown
Walk as if you are kissing the Earth with your feet. — Thich Nhat Hanh
Live deeply, live simply, live with reverence.
Act with love, think with clarity, speak with truth.
Your presence is your power.
Stillness is the language God speaks. — Eckhart Tolle
Breathe. This moment is precious and enough.
The wound is the place where the light enters you. — Rumi
Every morning we are born again. What we do today matters most.
Let go of attachments; embrace the flow.
In the depth of winter, I finally learned there was in me an invincible summer. — Albert Camus
Where there is love there is life. — Gandhi
Be the witness of your thoughts, not the thinker.
When you do things from your soul, you feel a river moving in you. — Rumi
The journey of a thousand miles begins with a single step. — Lao Tzu
Light tomorrow with today’s faith.
Peace begins with a smile. — Mother Teresa
Do not be afraid to be weak. Be only afraid of being dishonest to yourself.
Stillness reveals the truth of the heart.
The universe has your back.
Trust the timing of your life.
Inner peace begins the moment you choose not to allow another person or event to control your emotions.
Be a lamp, a lifeboat, or a ladder. Help someone’s soul ignite.
What you think, you become. — Buddha
When the soul lies down in that grass, the world is too full to talk about. — Rumi
A grateful heart is a magnet for miracles.
Let the beauty of what you love be what you do. — Rumi
No mud, no lotus. Growth comes from the compost of our struggles. — Thich Nhat Hanh (paraphrase)
The heart that gives, gathers. — Tao Te Ching (paraphrase)
Be still and the world will speak.
Choose compassion over judgment.
Peace is present right here and now. — Thich Nhat Hanh
Your true home is in the present moment.
Listen to the silence. It has so much to say.
Keep your face to the sunshine and you cannot see a shadow. — Hellen Keller
May your life be an expression of gratitude and grace.
Let your soul catch up with your body.
Kindness is the language the blind can see and the deaf can hear.
Calmness is the cradle of power.
A single act of kindness throws out roots in all directions.
The heart is an ocean of secrets waiting to be explored.
Do less. Be more. Receive more.
The present moment is a teacher; learn its lessons.
True abundance is a peaceful heart.
Find the sacred in the ordinary.
Peace is not absence of conflict but the presence of love.
You are a universe of possibilities.
Harmony begins when we align with our inner rhythm.
The mind is a wonderful servant but a terrible master.
Let the silence inside you guide your actions.
Wherever you stand, be the soul of that place.
The light you carry brightens the path of others.
Offer your pain to the fire of transformation.
Simplicity reveals the essence.
May your actions be rooted in love.
Be like a tree: stay grounded, keep growing, and give shade.
The seeker finds what is there to be found.
Blessings come in quiet packages.
Trust that every ending is the seed of a new beginning.
When you change the way you look at things, the things you look at change. — Wayne Dyer
Compassion is the root of courage.
Let patience do the heavy lifting.
Love is the bridge between you and everything. — Rumi
Awaken to the miracle of being alive.
Breathe in peace, breathe out gratitude.
The simplest prayer is thank you.
Each moment is a doorway to presence.
Radiate love and watch the world soften.
A calm mind brings inner strength and self-confidence.
Plant seeds of intention; harvest a life of meaning.
Be the silence that heals.
Do everything with a heart full of grace.
Your soul knows the way — walk slowly and listen.
The true measure of success is stillness.
Gratitude is the fairest blossom which springs from the soul. — Henry Ward Beecher
A heart at peace gives life to the body. — Proverbs (paraphrase)
Let your spirit be your compass.
Joy is the echo of love.
May your day be blessed with small miracles.
The more you let go, the more you receive.
Offer your life as a prayer.
In stillness the highest truth is heard.
The divine dances in ordinary things.
Be a mirror of kindness.
Surrender opens the door to miracles.
Embrace the mystery; it carries wisdom.
Presence is the greatest gift you can offer another.
Allow your inner light to guide your outward steps.
To know yourself is to know the universe.
Cherish the silence between breaths.
A humble heart is a beautiful heart.
May your intentions be clear and compassionate.
Let every action be an offering.
Awareness is the doorway to transformation.
The soul is nourished by simple kindnesses.
Seek not to follow in the footsteps of the wise; seek what they sought. — Matsuo Basho (paraphrase)
Where your heart is, there your treasure will be. — Biblical paraphrase
Let love be your lasting practice.
Inner work is the highest form of worship.
Find balance in effort and surrender.
Be present, be kind, be grateful.
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 114
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 115
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 116
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 117
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 118
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 119
Inner light guides you — reflect, breathe, awaken. — Quote 120
